com.k2.Util

Class ObjectUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Util.ObjectUtil

  • public class ObjectUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static utility method for interacting with objects
    Author:
    simon

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static <E,V> V get(E obj,
                          java.lang.Class<V> valueClass,
                          java.lang.String alias)
        This static method gets the value from the given object identified by the given class and alias
        Type Parameters:
        E - The class of the object from which to get a value
        V - The class of the value to get from the object
        Parameters:
        obj - The object from which to get the value
        valueClass - The class of the value to be returned
        alias - The alias of the field or method that is to return the value
        Returns:
        The value supplied by the underlying field or method

      • canGet

        public static boolean canGet(java.lang.Object obj,
                             java.lang.Class<?> valueClass,
                             java.lang.String alias)
        This static method identifies whether a value could be got from the given object with the given class and alias
        Parameters:
        obj - The object from which a value is required
        valueClass - The class of the value to be got
        alias - The alias of the field or method that is to supply the value
        Returns:
        The value returned by the underlying field or method

      • copy

        public static <T> void copy(T fromObj,
                            T toObj)
        This static method copies the value of all the fields accessible through the first object to the second object
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class of the object being copied
        Parameters:
        fromObj - The source object
        toObj - The object whose fields will be updated to match those in the source object

      • findFirstMatch

        public static <T> T findFirstMatch(java.util.List<T> lst1,
                                   java.util.List<T> lst2)
        This static method finds the first matching item in each list or null if none of the list contents match
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of objects in the given lists
        Parameters:
        lst1 - The first list
        lst2 - The second list
        Returns:
        The first matching object in each list

      • getObjectsAt

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> getObjectsAt(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                 java.lang.String path,
                                                 java.lang.Class<T> cls)
        This static method retrieves all the instances of the given class found at the end of the given path of field aliases for the given root object
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class of the objects to be listed
        Parameters:
        obj - The root object from which to extract the embedded instances of the given class found at the end of the given path of field aliased
        path - A '/' separated list of field aliases defining the navigation path to follow to locate instances of the given class
        cls - The class of the objects to extract from the given root object.
        Returns:
        The list of instances of the given class found at the end of the given path in the given root object.

      • putObjectAt

        public static <T> void putObjectAt(java.lang.Object obj,
                                   java.lang.String path,
                                   T embeddedObj)
        This static method sets the value of the end of the path to the given object so long as the path does not traverse a collection field
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class of the object to out on the object tree
        Parameters:
        obj - The object at the root of the given path
        path - The path identify the location in the object tree to add the embedded object. The final item in the path can be a collection however collections anywhere on the path other than the end are skipped
        embeddedObj - The object to add at the end of the path

      • deleteObjectAt

        public static <T> void deleteObjectAt(java.lang.Object obj,
                                      java.lang.String path,
                                      T embeddedObj)
        This static method removes the given object from the end of the given path staring from the given object
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class of the object to remove from the object tree
        Parameters:
        obj - The root object from which to start the path
        path - A string representation of the path to the field in which to remove the given embedded object
        embeddedObj - The object to remove from the end of the path
